name: Project S.K.I.F.F.
description:
New shooter in development for the original NES. This demo is a very early build of a game currently in development. Many aspects of the game will most likely change, however the pacing and bulk of concept is in place. In this version, wether you loose or win you should get the Game Over text.

Next build :

Intro and start screen will be added. FX sounds will be finalized ( shooting sound for instance is temp.) Player position in "radar" will be synched to actual current "wave" in game. Known bugs will be taken care of .  Sprites and code will be optimized etc.

*************************

A mapper30 compatible emulator like Messen must be used to play this rom.

Runs great on Mister and Everdrive n8pro
